Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase 1 deliverables: PRD, AI Report, and Test Suite

- Add PRD.md with shared exploration cache architecture design
- Add AI_REPORT.md documenting AI-assisted development workflow
- Add TEST_SUITE.md with verification strategy documentation
- Add comprehensive test suite \(bit-packing, energy, cache, MTS, quantum, integration\)
- Remove template files replaced by actual submissions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
